entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bridgewater
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 5.
